Question.Subject: Is this site offline for you?
Question.Content: I already asked this question 1 hour ago, but it appears to not be working again. http://gamingrant.com/ I tried updating the site, and for some reason it is offline.. again. Does it work for you? My host is Yahoo, and they shouldn't be messing up, should they? I mean, they should be reliable, so it has to be something I did, right? Last time I asked this question it magically started working again, lol.. That is why I did it again, hoping it might start working. @Tony: Thanks for including a link to my other question..
Question.ChosenAnswer:
site is loading extremely slowly and then quits. I only get a partial load. my browser shows only a blank page. the source shows only this much loaded:

Answer.Content:
Yep, it's timing out.
Call your host and chew them out.
Yes it is offline dude ! (im in mexico)
it wont let me open it D:
No, when you work offline it means you don't have a good online connection. And mine always works which is odd
